events.name: Struggle for Justice: Legal Year in Review for TST
events.description: Join Matthew Kezhaya, Sonia Kezhaya and Stu De Haan, part of the legal team fighting for our rights for an update on our court cases including Arkansas, Boston, Belle Plaine and others.

events.name: Demons, Monsters, and Pagans: The True Story of Christmas with Thomas Vallor
events.description: Most people are familiar with the Christmas monster Krampus nowadays, but there is so much more - in fact, Christmas is like a second Halloween! Deluxe edition, now with more monsters!

events.name: Lucien's Christmas Miracle
events.description: The second annual Lucien's Christmas Miracle. Fuck yeah!

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy with Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join Mercy for music and videos celebrating the season. Learn more about the show and pick up some sweet merch at whimsicalblasphemy.com

events.name: Movies that Hurt: The Star Wars Holiday Special
events.description: CW: Mentions and depictions of drug use. Join Tanooki Lizzz, Randy Faust and Malak Gorcrow as TST3K takes on the Star Wars Holiday Special (with mostly factual trivia.) A notoriously painful movie to watch, see how far you get in this endurance test while learning what may or may not have happened on set.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
